LanguageData.VFEM2_HemogenDraught.label: hemogen draught
LanguageData.VFEM2_HemogenDraught.description: A draught is improving all traits and abilities of the hemogenic user, as well as replenishes the hemogen over time.
LanguageData.VFEM2_HemogenDraught.stages.0.label: fading
LanguageData.VFEM2_HemogenDraught.stages.1.label: potent
